attributes.action: Abolish prescription charges for transplant patients who have to take drugs to keep them alive
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why is it that people who have had transplants and have to take drugs to keep them alive have to pay for their prescriptions? When foreigners can come straight into the country and can claim every benefit that is avaliable to them which they are not entitled to. Can we go into their countries and claim the benefits that they get from our country?
